Moving your transport card to the cloud...

1.When clearing data, the transportation card will be moved out to the cloud by default, and you can choose to move it in in the wallet-transportation card.Other cards will be cancelled and deleted, and cannot be restored after deletion.

2.You can also skip the clearing. The card information such as the transportation card, door card, MiPay and other cards you have opened cannot be cleared. It will be restored after you start your phone and log in to the same account next time.
The following cards will be moved to the cloud
The following cards do not support deletion, the cards will remain on this device.
After the mifare card cloud backup function is turned off, your newly simulated key card will not be backed up to the cloud. Are you sure to turn it off?

The key card already supports the cloud backup function. After confirming that it is turned on, the key card will be backed up to the cloud and associated with your Mi account, so that you can manage the backed up key card on your other devices synchronously.

The card has been created successfully. In order to improve the card security and card swiping experience, you need to verify your physical card again and write more card data. Please verify.

The card has been successfully created. In order to improve the card safety and card swiping experience, your physical card will be verified again after about %1$s time. Please pay attention to the notification of card status change.

string.name: double_press_power_guide_subtitle
string.Data: <font color=#9B9B9B>Double pressing the Power button will open</font> <font color=#FF7700>Mi Wallet</font><font color=#9B9B9B> now. You can change this in Settings > Button and gesture shortcuts.</font>

This account information will be provided to the card service provider for your card balance refund 4. The balance of the card will be returned to the account you used to recharge the card within 3 working days. Used for issuing and tapping card experience optimization
Your mobile number will be read when adding a Mi Pay bank card
To improve card security, you need to obtain your mobile phone information when adding a Mi Pay card
Used for transportation card company customer service or bank card to confirm the activation of the card when adding Mi Pay

When you add a Mi Pay bank card, transportation card, community access card, or other business cards that require a mobile phone number, you can automatically fill in the verification code by turning on this permission.

"Make sure that the phone number you're using is associated with your bank account. "

Contact our customer service to get more help:
The verificatrion code is sent to the phone number associated with your bank account.

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Smart cards. We will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As Smart cards provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept these services. As a result, your assets and benefits might be lost, as your data will be deleted permanently."
Your device needs to connect to the network for you to be able to withdraw consent. Check your network settings and try again.
Before trying to withdraw consent again, try the following actions:
Please bring your phone closer to reader or show the QR code
Reading card success, Connecting with issuer...

%s transportation card service is abnormal, temporarily unable to apply for a refund
Scanner has been uninstalled, install Scanner to continue?
SecureNfc already opened, please close it first

"Smart cards (transit cards, Mi Pay, card keys, and more) [Tips] Service cancellation is an irreversible action. Back up all the important items before you continue, as they might be deleted permanently. Please note that smart cards are saved to a secure element on your device. Canceling services won't delete the data stored in the secure element. To ensure the security of your assets, delete all the cards associated with this device manually before you cancel services. [Transit cards] All transit card information along with transaction history will be permanently deleted after you cancel services. If you have any questions regarding refunds, please contact our customer service (400-100-5678) before canceling services; otherwise, we won't be able to address your issues [Mi Pay] All cards associated with this device and your Mi Account (including corresponding phone numbers and ID info) will be permanently deleted. Contact UnionPay customer service (95516) if you have any questions regarding transactions or our customer service (400-100-5678) in case you have any questions about issuing or removing Mi Pay cards. Note that we won't be able to help if you contact us after you cancel services. [Card keys] All card key related history (including added and deleted card keys) will be permanently deleted. Contact our customer support if you have any questions. Note that we won't be able to answer your questions after you cancel services."
Before trying to cancel services again, try the following actions:
Your device needs to connect to the network for you to be able to cancel services. Check your network settings and try again.
"Here's what will change after you cancel services"
Unable to obtain mobile phone information, if you want to continue adding Mi Pay bank card, please enable the permission to obtain mobile phone information

To open the smart card, the swipe position of the door card should be set

Card range refers to the area of the current card used by default. Use a range loop to generate CARDS centered on your selected location and set the range as the radius. The maximum setting range is %1$d meters and the minimum is %2$d meters.
The range can be set to %1$dm to %2$dm
The card will be swiped by default. Please try to avoid bus stops

All unsaved settings will be lost. Discard changes?
Set time overlaps with another custom time period. Set time again.
The start time and end time must be different.
"Start time can't be later than end time. Set time again."
Set this card as default? Previous settings will be discarded.
